txt.en: Dagor can be found in Arnach, near the keep.\n\nYou should return to Dagor and tell him how you destroyed the enemy's boats and supplies.
The Haradrim boats and supply caches are near the mouth of the River Erui in Lossarnach.\n\nNow that you have discovered the landing area, you should burn their boats and destroy their supply piles.
DNT Haradrim landing site located along the River Erui

'We have truly struck a blow to the Southrons' heels! By ensuring they cannot fight, or think, or run, they will surely crumple before us.\n\n'This, [placeholder] - this is the difference between the war-wise commander and a rustic clad in mail and arms. This is why I should be at Forlong's side in Minas Tirith!'

'We have truly struck a blow to the Southrons' heels! By ensuring they cannot fight, or think, or run, they will surely crumple before us.\n\n'This, [placeholder] - this is the difference between the war-wise commander and a rustic clad in mail and arms. This is why I should be at Forlong's side in Minas Tirith!'

'The first rule of warfare, [placeholder], is to give the enemy no quarter. If they cannot pull back and regroup, they must either bend - or break.

'Now it so happens my men have espied some of the boats that brought the Haradrim into Lossarnach. They are here and there along the banks by the mouth of the River Erui. They have also noted piles of supplies, not far from the boats.

'I say: let us burn their boats; let us trample their supplies. Then they'll have nowhere to run. Then we'll have them! And by we, I mean me in thought and you in action. As a captain I cannot leave Arnach, and you are more than up to the task.'
Dagor has an ingenious scheme to bring the Haradrim to their knees by destroying their supply piles and their boats.
The Haradrim boats and supply caches are near the mouth of the River Erui in Lossarnach.\n\nFirst, you should locate the area where the boats and the caches were seen.
